definitions.definition: A person or thing that resuscitates .
A device , usually consisting of a face mask and tank , used to restore normal breathing to a person by forcing oxygen or an oxygen-rich mixture of gases into their lungs .

main_definition: A person or thing that resuscitates .
secondary_definitions: ( medicine ) A device , usually consisting of a face mask and tank , used to restore normal breathing to a person by forcing oxygen or an oxygen-rich mixture of gases into their lungs .
